nameOfTheWindMod:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
nameOfTheWindMod:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

nameOfTheWindMod:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
nameOfTheWindMod:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
nameOfTheWindMod:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

nameOfTheWindMod:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
nameOfTheWindMod:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

nameOfTheWindMod:DefaultAttackWithVariab.NAME: Special Strike
nameOfTheWindMod:DefaultAttackWithVariab.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage [E] times. NL (Deal !nameOfTheWindMod:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

nameOfTheWindMod:DefaultSecondMagicNumbe.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
nameOfTheWindMod:DefaultSecondMagicNumbe.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !nameOfTheWindMod:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
